-e ---

𓊢𓂝𓏏 attend ~ 𓊢 ⋍ stand 𓋴𓊢𓂝 𓋴𓊣 <> hand 𓂝𓏏 𓊢 ⋍ stand 𓊢 'then' 𒆠 KI® que 𓊨 qursi™ 𓊢 𓊡 ἱστίον histíon 𓎛 𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 𓏤 “sail” 𓊢 Stamm stand then dann 󴐵 󴐶 󴐷 󴐸 󴐹 󴐺 stick 󴐺 stint 󴐷 𓊢 Masten (false singular/plural) vs Posten (ma/po article prefix)
𓊢 Masten≠Posten⋍past stand=padan@Persia 𓃀

𓌙 ⋍stand 𐎿𐎫𐎠𐎴 स्थान -ստան sthā́na 𓋴𓊢𓂝 𓋴𓊣 vs 𓊾𓊽
𓌙 ⋍stan: Afghanistan Kyrgyzstan Pakistan Egyptian people/country suffix

some strong duality :

𓊢 𓊢 󴬓 󴬒 󴬏 󴬅 󴬆 󴬇 󴬈 󴬉 󴬊 󴬋 󴬌 󴬍 󴬎 󴬐 󴬑 󴬔 󴬕 󴬖 󴬗 󴬘 󴬙 󴬚 󴬃 󴬄

𓊢 𓂝 𓇤 | pile | Stapel sta'pile

𓏏 𓃹 𓈖 | rise, raise | √tenō ziehen ⇔ otoño ⇔ 𓊢 𓂝 𓂻 stand
